**Streaming Support** - Token-by-token decoding for LLM generation

## Highlights

- ðŸŒŠ **Streaming decode** - Real-time token-by-token output
- ðŸ” **Token introspection** - Query token properties and types
- ðŸ·ï¸ **Special token detection** - Identify control tokens

## What's New

### New API
```rust
// Streaming decode - single token at a time
tokenizer.decode_single(token_id) -> Result<String>

// Get raw token bytes/text
tokenizer.token_to_piece(token_id) -> Result<Vec<u8>>

// Query token classification
tokenizer.token_type(token_id) -> Option<TokenType>

// Check if token is special (BOS, EOS, PAD, etc.)
tokenizer.is_special_token(token_id) -> bool
```

### Use Cases

**Streaming LLM Generation**
```rust
for token_id in generated_tokens {
    let text = tokenizer.decode_single(token_id)?;
    print!("{}", text);  // Real-time output
}
```

**Token Debugging**
```rust
for (i, token_id) in tokens.iter().enumerate() {
    let piece = tokenizer.token_to_piece(*token_id)?;
    let is_special = tokenizer.is_special_token(*token_id);
    println!("[{}] {} {:?} special={}", i, token_id, piece, is_special);
}
```

### Test Coverage
- 6 new streaming-specific tests
- Full round-trip validation

## Installation

```toml
[dependencies]
shimmytok = "0.4"
```
